distributor_id = #{distributorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update distributor_commission set distributor_id = #{distributorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, commission = #{commission,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalCommission = #{totalcommission,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select 'false' as QUERYID,
from distributor_commission where distributor_id = #{distributorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by create_time desc limit 0,1

select count(*) from distributor_commission
distributor_id = #{distributorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_time) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
